ActContraventions Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Application of Provincial Laws Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the APPLICATION OF PROVINCIAL LAWS REGULATIONS, in order to make the FRENCH LANGUAGE SERVICES ACT of PRINCE EDWARD ISLAND applicable to the prosecution of federal contraventions, and to protect the language rights of offenders at trial.
